content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601387955380{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/advice-Guidance.jpg?id=12026) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ el_id=”header-area” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Cyber Advice
and Guidance

Do you need a cybersecurity strategy but don’t know how to formulate an effective one for your organisation?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1600963545408{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Cyber-Advice-and-Guidance.jpg?id=12898) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601028257832{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

Cyber Advice and Guidance

Do you need a cybersecurity strategy but don’t know how to formulate an effective one for your organisation?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1588849858825{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1588847349437{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″]

Why would you need cyber advice and guidance?

[vc_row_inner el_class=”square-icons”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″]

To fill crucial gaps and obtain real-world insights into your cybersecurity.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”square-icons”]

To get effective strategies tailored to your environment and ways to implement them.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”square-icons”]

To get help with legal issues around breaches and data privacy.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601641772259{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/advice.jpg?id=11149) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Strategic cybersecurity guidance from experts

[vc_column_text]We understand that not everyone understands the cyber threats faced by their organisation. However, it is important to know how to protect yourself. We are cybersecurity experts with over 20 years’ experience and we will give you cybersecurity strategy guidance tailored to your needs.

Our consultancy staff comprise experienced, trusted, advisors and industry experts in specific security disciplines. This gives us the ability to highlight the value of cybersecurity and to put it into your organisation’s context, enabling you to understand how an end-to-end security risk management capability can be formulated.

We are also ready to advise your senior management and board of directors on formulating a strategic response to risk as well as providing detailed technical analysis. We will help you address the legal issues around breaches and data privacy, and will work alongside you to build a culture and environment where your human resource understands how to behave securely and act appropriately.[/vc_column_text]

Do you need cybersecurity advice and measures to manage your risks and build confidence in your digital future?

Get in touch
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

"I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

Managing Director

Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

“As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

Security Manager

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

“I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

Managing Director

Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

“My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

CISO

24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

“I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

Head of Training

Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601387967856{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
